projects.title: Neptune Finance
projects.content: Most of my experience with modern frontend frameworks comes from leading the development of the Neptune Finance web application — a borrowing and lending platform built with CosmWasm and deployed on the Injective blockchain. My responsibilities have spanned across frontend engineering, UI/UX design, branding, deployments, and overall user experience strategy. I also led the development of the Neptune Landing site. For the landing pages, I adopted a creative approach to design, integrating time-series data of interest rates into the visual elements to highlight the core focus of the lending market.
projects.content2: The interface is developed using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, with additional UI components from Material UI and Daisy UI. I've also utilized Figma and Midjourney to establish the product's visual identity and design language. To streamline design and development, I built a custom Figma component library and created reusable assets for marketing materials.
projects.content3: Recent work includes launching Staking and Airdrop pages in support of the NEPT token release, and building Pool pages that integrates Mito and Astroport smart contracts and LP tokens. I introduced novel UX patterns to improve the user experience around liquidity management and implemented gated protocol features for NEPT stakers.

projects.title: stakefish / f2pool
projects.content: While working with stakefish, a leading validator in the Proof-of-Stake ecosystem, I produced a wide range of motion graphics content aimed at educating and engaging the crypto community. This included a full library of explainer videos designed to help users understand how to stake their assets securely and effectively with validators across Ethereum, Cosmos, and Solana.
projects.content2: In addition to educational content, I crafted visual assets and animated campaigns for social media, with a focus on protocol health, decentralization, and user participation in staking. These assets helped promote the benefits of staking while reinforcing stakefish’s position as a trusted validator across emerging sectors like DeFi, NFTs, DAOs, and the metaverse.
projects.content3: Alongside my work at stakefish, I also contributed motion design and visual content for f2pool, Ethereum's leading mining pool at the time, where I supported their Carbon Credits initiative under the BICOWG working group. This involved promoting sustainability efforts and communicating f2pool’s transition narrative in the wake of Ethereum’s move to Proof-of-Stake.

projects.title: Open Source Contributions
projects.content: Neptune Finance identified a gap in the support for the CW3 Fixed Multisig smart contract standard on the Injective blockchain. As part of the Cosmos ecosystem, we were able to leverage open-source software deployed on other platforms. By refactoring a decentralized application (dapp) from Stargaze, originally developed for Juno, Neptune successfully brought this essential service to Injective.
projects.content2: The most significant challenge in porting this Cosmos repository was adapting it to the EVM-compatible architecture of Injective. While the dapp was able to query contracts, the transaction submission process required refactoring for compatibility with the Injective SDK. Additionally, several quality enhancements were implemented, such as decoding messages from Base64 and enabling formatted output for improved debugging and error detection. I also incorporated local storage functionality to cache frequently accessed contracts, optimizing performance.
projects.content3: Other open source contributions include update token listings and the development of adapters for various platforms such as Cosmos Chain Registry, Injective Labs, Keplr Contract Registry, and DeFi Llama Adapters.

projects.title: Cryptech Developments Ltd.
projects.content: I also developed the Cryptech Developments website for the company behind Neptune. I leveraged elements from the logo to guide the design and added mouse parallax effects to enhance the visual appeal and interactivity.
projects.content2: I also developed the interface for a project titled Macro DEX for an additional project associated with Cryptech. I developed the brand identity and designed visual and functional components for the application.

projects.title: All About Blockchain
projects.content: I am a co-founder of All About Blockchain, a DAO running node infrastructure and developing blockchain projects.
projects.content2: Stakefolio is one of our projects, a platform for tracking and managing staking portfolios. The focus for this project is an approachable UI/UX for beginners to learn about staking and begin their journey.

projects.title: Cosmoverse 2023 / Hackathons
projects.content: Collaborating with DesignDAO, I built a dynamic schedule page for Cosmoverse 2023 referencing Google Sheets for easy upkeep and edits of the schedule. The schedule page was constructed as a javascript embed object into a Framer website, the CMS of choice by DesignDAO.
projects.content2: I have also participated in HackFS 2022, where our team produced Dyve, an NFT shorting primitive that allows users to lend, rent or short NFTs. The project was winner of 🏊‍♂️ NFTPort — Pool Prize, 🥈 Covalent — Best Use, and 5️⃣ Polygon — Top 5. I also participated in ETHOnline 2024, where our project Turing.Bet was a dapp to wager if content was real vs AI generated where I developed the UI/UX.
projects.content3: I have also submitted Satsuma for ICP - WCHL25. Satsuma is a cross-chain yield-to-Bitcoin conversion platform that enables users to deposit yield-bearing stablecoins and automatically convert the generated yield to native Bitcoin across ecosystems. Satsuma operates across Injective (yield generation and yield skimming) and Internet Computer (ICP) (yield accumulation and Bitcoin conversion). Flow: USDC deposit → Injective vault → nUSDC; yield is skimmed back to USDC → bridged via Axelar GMP → ICP canister → Bitcoin conversion. Technical components include an Injective smart contract with principal tracking and full Astroport integration for USDC ↔ nUSDC swaps, plus an ICP canister that receives yield, manages BTC conversion, and orchestrates Injective operations.
